Acumen.card_desc: [Explosive Flask] Gain {scale=10|10}% Lifesteal against enemies slowed by Explosive Flask.

Catalyst.card_desc: [Explosive Flask] Targets hit with Explosive Flask are marked for 3s and take 40% increased damage from your Weapon Shots.

Combat Medic.card_desc: [Healing Potion] Potion Launcher now also heals allies.

From Above.card_desc: [Weightless] Reduces the Cooldown of Weightless by {scale=.5|.5}s.

Gift Giver.card_desc: [Healing Potion] You gain {scale=20|20}% of Healing Potion’s effect if you hit a teammate but not yourself.

Graviton.card_desc: [Explosive Flask] Increase the duration of Explosive Flask's slow by {scale=0.25|0.25}s.

Medicinal Excellence.card_desc: [Healing Potion] Increase the Radius of your Healing Potion by {scale=8|8}%

Mega Potion.card_desc: [Healing Potion] Healing Potion heals allies for 100% more.

Moxie.card_desc: [Armor] Receive {scale=6|6}% increased healing when below 50% Health.

Pep in the Step.card_desc: [Healing Potion] Allies hit by Healing Potion gain {scale=10|10}% movement speed for 1.5s.

Refreshing Jog.card_desc: [Weightless] Regenerate {scale=50|50} Health every second while in Weightless.

Reload.card_desc: [Healing Potion] Instantly reduce Healing Potion's Cooldown by {scale=0.6|0.6}s for each ally hit.

Shrewd Move.card_desc: [Armor] Eliminations reduce all active cooldowns by {scale=8|8}%

Side Tanks.card_desc: [Explosive Flask] Reduce the Cooldown of Explosive Flask by {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Smithereens.card_desc: [Explosive Flask] Hitting an enemy with Explosive Flask generates {scale=1|1} Ammo.

Sprint.card_desc: [Weightless] Gain an additional {scale=10|10}% bonus Jump Speed during Weightless.

Sturdy.card_desc: [Weapon] Your weapon no longer knocks you back and deals {scale=20|20}% less self damage.
